data.prayer: Spirit, help the 22,633 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,023,767 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Vĩnh Long, Vietnam

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Vĩnh Long.
Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Vĩnh Long, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Vĩnh Long.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Indonesian people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Vĩnh Long, Vietnam to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Over 89.82 percent of the people of Vĩnh Long are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Father, encourage the 22,633 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
